sentences.en: A boat came into my line of vision (= direction I was looking in ).
sentences.cn: 一艘船进入了我的视线。

sentences.en: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.cn: 林荫道

sentences.en: Are those curtains lined?
sentences.cn: 那些窗帘加衬里了吗？

sentences.en: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains.
sentences.cn: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

sentences.en: Britain has come into line with other Western democracies in giving the vote to its citizens living abroad.
sentences.cn: 英国已经和其他西方民主国家一样，让海外公民拥有选举权了。

sentences.en: Crowds lined the route to the palace.
sentences.cn: 人群夹道站在通往王宫的路上。

sentences.en: Deliveries are made by common carrier or van line.
sentences.cn: 货物运输采用普通货车或厢式货车。

sentences.en: Draw a straight line across the top of the page.
sentences.cn: 在这一页的上方画一条直线。

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: He raced towards the finishing line.
sentences.cn: 他朝终点线冲刺。

sentences.en: He was trying to keep out of the bird's line of sight.
sentences.cn: 他试图躲到那只鸟看不到的地方。

sentences.en: Her ear, shoulder and hip are in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 她的耳朵、肩膀和髋部呈一条直线。

sentences.en: I always peer at other people's baskets as we stand in line.
sentences.cn: 我们排队时，我总是瞟一瞟别人的篮子。

sentences.en: I decided to crop the picture just above the water line.
sentences.cn: 我决定把这张照片水印以下的部分裁掉。

sentences.en: I knew that somewhere down the line there would be an inquest.
sentences.cn: 我知道在某一阶段陪审团会进行讯问。

sentences.en: Light travels in a straight line.
sentences.cn: 光沿直线传播。

sentences.en: lined up considerable support for the bill.
sentences.cn: 准备好对此法案的重要支持

sentences.en: Megamalls and fast food restaurants line the highway system.
sentences.cn: 公路系统沿线有大型商场和快餐店。

sentences.en: Most members of Parliament took a hard line on this issue.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数议员在这个问题上都持强硬立场。

sentences.en: remuneration is in line with comparable international organizations.
sentences.cn: 报酬与同等国际机构一致。

sentences.en: She quoted a great line from a book by Romain Gary.
sentences.cn: 她引用了罗曼·加里的一本书中的名句。

sentences.en: Sign your name on the dotted line (= line made up of a series of dots ).
sentences.cn: 在虚线上签名。

sentences.en: that threat kept a lot of people in line.
sentences.cn: 那威胁吓住了很多人。

sentences.en: the change in the law will bring Britain into line with Europe.
sentences.cn: 法律的修改将让英国和欧洲一致起来。

sentences.en: The Chief Constable's clipped tones crackled over the telephone line.
sentences.cn: 电话线那头噼里啪啦地传来警察局长短促的声音。

sentences.en: The edges of the pitch are marked by white lines.
sentences.cn: 球场的四边画着白线。

sentences.en: The four men were standing in a line on the other side of the table.
sentences.cn: 那四个男人在桌子的另一边站成一排。

sentences.en: The goalkeeper just managed to stop the ball going over the line.
sentences.cn: 守门员刚好把球截住，没有让它越过球门线。

sentences.en: the mistakes were due to lack of care all down the line.
sentences.cn: 错误是因在每一环节上都不够谨慎而造成的。

sentences.en: The sparse line of spectators noticed nothing unusual.
sentences.cn: 稀稀疏疏的一排观众并没注意到什么特别之处。

sentences.en: The train backed out of Adelaide Yard on to the Dublin-Belfast line.
sentences.cn: 火车倒出了阿德莱德调车场，开上了都柏林-贝尔法斯特线。

sentences.en: The wings were at right angles to the line of flight.
sentences.cn: 机翼与航线成直角。

sentences.en: They hurtled across the line in a flat-out sprint.
sentences.cn: 他们拼命冲刺，越过终点线。

sentences.en: They knew they needed to block their enemy’s supply lines (= the direction used for carrying supplies of food etc ).
sentences.cn: 他们知道必须封锁敌人的补给线。

sentences.en: You must claim your prize by telephoning our claims line.
sentences.cn: 您必须通过拨打我们的领奖电话来领取奖品。

phrases.tran_cn: (桥牌)在横线上方的（指奖分和罚分不计算在内的）

phrases.phrase: all (the way) down (或 along) the line

phrases.tran_cn: 在某一时刻，在某一阶段，稍后
精确地,准确地,正确地 [亦作 by line and level]
与…符号，与…一致，与…不符合，与…不一致

phrases.phrase: lay (或 put) it on the line

phrases.tran_cn: 处于危险中；模棱两可；在电话线上
不协调，不一致；不成直线
生产线；产品线；产品系列
尽头，极限（指再作努力已无用的时刻或阶段）

trans.tran_cn: 线条，皱纹，行，列，队伍，字行，对白，诗行，罚写，话语，绳，电话线，路线，铁轨，运输公司，轮廓，界线，防线，立场，方式，行业，种类，流水线，家系，排序，一条细线的可卡因
trans.tran_en: a long thin mark on a piece of paper, the ground, or another surface

trans.tran_cn: 沿…排列成行，使有内衬，在…形成一层
trans.tran_en: to form rows along the sides of something
to form rows along the sides of something

trans.tran_cn: 使排成一行；用线标示，画线于
trans.tran_en: to form rows along the sides of something
